name: A life on the planet Kreon, scene #1
description:
The planet Kreon is located in the constellation Treyo, approximate coordinates: right ascension α = 15h 25m; declination δ = - 11°13’
If you go to this planet, you will see mostly desert landscapes, full of sand and rocky soil and quite high mountains, among which lakes are hidden, surrounded by amazing plants. 
The fauna of the planet is diverse. You can find very large and small animals, and wonderful birds there. Sometimes you can meet predatory plants also, so please be careful. 
And it’s also interesting that in the womb of the planet, inside its heart, there is a mineral called kreo. It, as a life-giving force, connects all the inhabitants of the planet. This mineral shines through their eyes, colors their skin, flows in their blood.

In this illustration, you can see petilaxes - very large animals, inhabitants of the desert, which are approached by alteons - somewhat similar to birds.
